title: FS: Ed Reulbach no glove EPDG PSA 3 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Ed Reulbach no glove EPDG PSA 3 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Popular common with a tougher back.  Asking $SOLD shipped. Has a small crease on the upper right hand corner, but is a really nice card.

Will listen to offers and trades.

Thanks

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=307227&d=1519927371[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=307228&d=1519927377[/IMG]
Beautiful card.  I actually owned that exact card up until a few months ago. Small world.
